attributes.action: Stop President Trump addressing both Houses of Parliament from Westminster Hall.
attributes.additional_details:
We understand that an invitation to address both Houses of Parliament in Westminster Hall would be made by John Bercow, Commons Speaker; Lord Fowler, Lords Speaker and Earl Peel, Great Lord Chamberlain.

We ask Parliament to debate whether President Trump is a fitting individual to be granted such an invitation in the instance of an Official State visit. We petition Parliament to support Speaker Berkow, Lord Fowler and Earl Peel in denying President Trump this honour.
attributes.background: We petition Parliament to refuse Donald Trump the honour of speaking in the Royal Palace of Westminster’s historic Westminster Hall.
